reference.title: cxxAPIMap module
reference.shortdesc: Provides the relationships among a set of C++ API topic types, and can be used to create a Table of Contents (TOC), aggregate C++ API topics into a PDF document, or to create links between topics in output.

section.title: Description
section.p: Maps provide a way to express relationships among a set of C++ API topic types in a single common format for the C++ API reference that can be used for different outputs. The cxxAPIMap module organizes your DITA files into a hierarchy. It can also create relationship links between your topics. Use <cxxAPIMap> to organize your work, and to create and edit C++ API DITA files.
